title: Bonang calls season 3 of 'Being Bonang' one of the 'worst working experiences' of her life
text:
Bonang calls season 3 of 'Being Bonang' one of the 'worst working experiences' of her life share this

Johannesburg – Bonang had some of her fans in their feels when she announced on Friday that season three of her reality show, Being Bonang, would be the last.

"After 3 successful seasons, Being Bonang ends TONIGHT! The next chapter awaits," the TV personality tweeted.

When one fan questioned if the show would be back for a fourth season, Bonang replied by confirming that it was "Finished. Finished. Finished."

In a tweet shared a few hours later, the star called working on the third season of the reality show one of the "worst working experiences" of her life, saying that she is "glad it's ending".

"Remind me to tell ya'll why one day!" she added.

The hit reality show first aired in 2017, giving fans a behind-the-scenes look at Queen B's life, and leaving fans hungry for more.

If you haven't seen the show yet or want to watch it again you can binge all three seasons on Showmax.
description: Bonang had some of her fans in their feels when she announced that season three of her reality show, 'Being Bonang', would be the last. But according to the star, she's glad it's over.
